history.proof: intros d a la ls hd b tl l Hrec. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros d a la ls hd b tl l Hrec. intros Hrecdef. induction l. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply rec_co_4 in Hrecdef. rewrite -> Hrecdef. apply rec_consn with (a:=a) (la:=la) (ls:=ls) (hd:=hd) (b:=b) (tl:=tl). + auto. + apply IHl. * apply rec_co_3 in Hrecdef. apply Hrecdef.
